import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import CartItem from '../components/CartItem' const Cart = () => { const {cart} = useSelector((state) => state); const [totalAmount, SetTotalAmount] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { SetTotalAmount( cart.reduce((acc, currvalue) => acc+currvalue), 0 ) }) return (
{ cart.length > 0 ? (
{ cart.map((item, index) => ( )) }

Your Cart

Summary

Total Items : {cart.length}

Total Cost : ${totalAmount}

) : (

Cart Empty

) }
) } export default Cart
